document.full_text: zynga inc is hiring two key developers of cocos2d, a popular game engine that powers top grossing iphone apps such as "tap pet hotel" and "tap zoo" in a move that will help the social games company boost its presence on smartphone and tablets.
document.title: zynga buys iphone game engine development team
lines_and_colors: zynga inc is hiring two key developers of cocos2d, a popular game engine that powers top grossing iphone apps such as "tap pet hotel" and "tap zoo" in a move that will help the social games company boost its presence on smartphone and tablets.
